info.description: This is a REST API for saving films you want to watch.
info.title: Watchlist API

get.description: Checks if the token provided in the Authorization header is still valid.

post.description: Log in to your account using your email and password. Returns tokens.
post.summary: Log in to your account with credentials

post.description: Log in to your account using verification token from header. Returns tokens.
post.summary: Log in to your account by Telegram

post.description: Log out of your account using your refresh token in the Authorization header.
Refresh your access token using the refresh token in the Authorization header.

Register a new user using a username and password. Returns user information and tokens.
Basic permissions are available to you: creating films and collections.
post.summary: Register a new user with credentials

post.description:
Register a new user using verification token from header. Returns user information and tokens.
Basic permissions are available to you: creating films and collections.
post.summary: Register a new user by Telegram

get.description: Get a list of collections by user ID from authentication token. It also returns metadata.

post.description: Add a new collection. You will be granted the permissions to get, update, and delete it.

get.description: Get the collection by ID. You must have permissions to get this collection.

put.description: Update the collection by ID. You must have the permissions to update it.

delete.description: Delete the collection by ID. You must have the permissions to delete it.

get.description:
Retrieves a list of films from a specified collection. This includes pagination and sorting metadata.
You must have permissions to access this collection.

parameters.description: Sorting by `id`, `title`, `rating`. Use `-` for descending order
parameters.name: sort

post.description: Create a new film and add it to the specified collection. You must have rights to create a film and update the collection.
post.summary: Add new film and associate with collection

get.description: Get the film from collection by ID. You must have permissions to get this collection.
get.summary: Get film from collection by ID

post.description: Add existing film to the collection. You must have rights to get the film and update the collection.

delete.description: Delete the film from the collection by ID. You must have the permissions to update collection.

get.description: Get a list of films by user ID from authentication token. It also returns metadata.

post.description: Add a new film. You will be granted the permissions to get, update, and delete it.

get.description: Get the film by ID. You must have permissions to get this film.

put.description: Update the film by ID. You must have the permissions to update it.

delete.description: Delete the film by ID. You must have the permissions to delete it.

get.description: Check the API status. Returns status and system information.
Get information about user by ID using an authentication token.

put.description: Update information about user by ID using an authentication token.

delete.description: Delete user by ID using an authentication token.

last_page.description: The last page number based on total records and page size.

page_size.description: The number of items per page.

total_records.description: The total number of records available.

access_token.description: JWT Access Token used to access protected resources.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created.

email.description: Email address of the user; must be a valid email format.

refresh_token.description: JWT Refresh Token used to obtain a new Access Token when it expires.

username.description: Username of the user; must be unique and valid.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the collection was created.

description.description: Description of the collection; optional, up to 500 characters.

name.description: Name of the collection; required, between 3 and 100 characters.

total_films.description: Total number of films in the collection.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the collection was last updated.

user_id.description: Identifier of the user who created the collection.

added_at.description: Timestamp when the film was added to the collection.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the association was last updated.

comment.description: User's comment of the film; optional, up to 500 characters.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the film was added.

description.description: Description of the film; optional, up to 1000 characters.

image_url.description: URL of the film's image; optional, must be a valid URL.

is_viewed.description: Indicates if the user has viewed the film.

rating.description: Rating of the film; optional, must be between 1 and 10.

review.description: User's review of the film; optional, up to 500 characters.

title.description: Title of the film; required, between 3 and 100 characters.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the film details were last updated.

url.description: URL for additional film information (e.g., IMDb or trailer); optional, must be valid.

user_id.description: Identifier of the user who added the film.

user_rating.description: User's rating of the film; optional, between 1 and 10.

year.description: Release year of the film; optional, must be between 1888 and 2100.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created.

email.description: Email address of the user; must be a valid email format.

username.description: Username of the user; must be unique and valid.

JWTAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {token}'
JWTAuth.name: Authorization
